2024.title: Qiskit 1.0
2024.description: Qiskit is used to program, simulate, and execute quantum algorithms on quantum computers by providing an open-source Python-based framework for creating quantum circuits, running them on real hardware or simulators, and developing quantum applications.

2024.title: Qiskit 2.0
2024.description: he Qiskit v2 release introduces several important enhancements in key areas including the C API, transpiler capabilities and quantum circuit usability. In addition, it includes many general improvements and bug fixes.
